summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4298 for the improvement of East Lynn Street, from Boyer Avenue to 24th Avenue North; and from 26th Avenue North on the north to approximately 180 feet east thereof; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51034, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
